actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, relating to adjustments in the allocation of gasoline.

summary.text: Provides that adjustments in gasoline allocation under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act shall be effective for at least 180 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, relating to adjustments in the allocation of gasoline.
